data.name: Digital Storm Eclipse Steam Machine
data.detailed_description:
The Eclipse is a steam machine that is fully equipped with desktop level performance in a slim footprint. Dominate the latest PC games thanks to Eclipse’s support for a full-size dedicated graphics card and desktop-class Intel processor. Always be one step ahead with the Eclipse’s gamer friendly design. Maximize upgradability with adjustable brackets and room for extra storage.

Key Features:

  • Desktop-class components in a slim design.
  • Full-size dedicated graphics card support.
  • Fully upgradable design.
